vote.title: To amend A0132-2023, Reappointment of Cynthia Hunt of, CLH and Associates, LLC, 672 City Park Avenue, Columbus, OH 43206, to serve on the Brewery District Commission (BDC), not the Brewery District Historic Commission (BDHC), with a new term expiration date of June 30, 2026 (résumé attached).
vote.description:
Title
 
To amend A0132-2023, Reappointment of Cynthia Hunt of, CLH and Associates, LLC, 672 City Park Avenue, Columbus, OH 43206, to serve on the Brewery District Commission (BDC), not the Brewery District Historic Commission (BDHC), with a new term expiration date of June 30, 2026 (résumé attached).
